subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: It was Yael Averbuch's decision, not her parents, to sacrifice the parties and the proms to make North Carolina her destination of destiny, where she has blossomed into a soccer standout.
snippet: It was Yael Averbuch's decision, not her parents, to sacrifice the parties and the proms to make North Carolina her destination of destiny, where she has blossomed into a soccer standout.
